title: book_Edie
text:
ISBN-13: 9780811855266.
ISBN-10: 0811855260.
Title: Edie.
Subtitle: Girl on Fire.
Authors: Melissa Painter;David Weisman.
Categories: Biography & Autobiography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YNEigmpVX5kC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: Drawn from firsthand accounts and featuring hundreds of never-before-published portraits, ad shoots, and candid snapshots, this revealing look at the life of Edie Sedgwick, the "it" girl of the Andy Warhol Factory scene, details her many roles as a model, film star, socialite, friend, lover, and drug addict..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.22.
Number of Pages: 192.
Ratings Count: 716.
